Section.Catchline: Fiscal powers of governing body; bonds, etc.

SectionBody.Text: The board of directors of any watershed improvement district shall have power, subject to the conditions and limitations of this chapter, to incur indebtedness and issue bonds of the watershed improvement district; however, such bonds shall be issued in full conformity with s. 12, Art. VII, of the Revised State Constitution, and chapter 100 insofar as said chapter relates to bond elections under said s. 12, Art. VII of the Constitution.
